TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WebEventCodes extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义与 ASP.NET 状况监视事件关联的代码。

span.span: Defines the codes associated with the ASP.NET health monitoring events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，用于管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在管理运行状况事件期间帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 类包含代码，可以标识类型的运行状况监视事件。The class contains codes that identify types of health-monitoring events. 在类中定义两种类型的代码： 主要代码，标识 ASP.NET 运行状况监视事件;并提供相关的主要代码相关的详细信息的详细信息代码。Two types of codes are defined within the class: major codes, which identify the ASP.NET health-monitoring events; and detail codes, which provide more information about a related major code. 为整数，而不是枚举，以允许扩展性实现这些代码。These codes are implemented as integers, rather than as an enumeration, to allow for extensibility. 当引发的运行状况监视的事件时，它都与主要事件代码关联。When a health-monitoring event is raised, it is associated with a major event code. 以下列表标识的主要事件代码中定义的类别类：The following list identifies the categories of major event codes that are defined within the class: - **应用程序代码**。**Application codes**. 应用程序代码标识事件的生存期的应用程序，例如启动和关闭事件。Application codes identify events in the lifetime of an application, such as startup and shutdown events. 其值是大于字段常量。Their values are greater than the field constant. 与之关联事件类型。They are associated with the event type. 检测信号事件是一种特殊的应用程序事件。The heartbeat event is a special kind of application event. 它标识在提供相对于正在运行的进程的状态信息的定期间隔引发事件。It identifies events raised at periodic intervals to provide information relative to the state of the running process. 与之关联事件类型。It is associated with the event type. - **请求代码**。**Request codes**. 请求代码标识非错误事件，提供每个请求信息。Request codes identify non-error events that provide per-request information. 其值是大于字段常量。Their values are greater than the field constant. 与之关联事件类型。They are associated with the event type. - **错误代码**。**Error codes**. 错误代码标识的事件，包含两种类型的错误有关的信息： 与 Web 请求和系统错误专门相关的错误。Error codes identify events that contain information about two kinds of errors: errors specifically related to a Web request and systemic errors. 向 Web 请求相关的错误包括未经处理的异常、 视图状态错误和输入验证错误。The errors related to Web requests include unhandled exceptions, view-state errors, and input-validation errors. 与之关联事件类型。They are associated with the event type. 与配置或应用程序代码，包括分析器错误和编译错误相关的系统错误。The systemic errors relate to configuration or application code, including parser errors and compilation errors. 与之关联事件类型。They are associated with the event type. 这两种错误具有值大于字段常量。Both kinds of errors have values greater than the field constant. - **审核代码**。**Audit codes**. 审核代码标识的事件，包含可审核的信息，例如登录尝试次数、 访问安全性冲突和授权冲突。Audit codes identify events that contain auditable information such as login attempts, access security violations, and authorization violations. 其值是大于。Their values are greater than . 与之关联及其派生的事件类型。They are associated with and its derived event types. - **杂项代码**。**Miscellaneous codes**. 杂项代码无法识别事件，但用于标记非标准的事件信息。Miscellaneous codes do not identify events but are used to flag nonstandard event information. 其值是大于。Their values are greater than . 请参考有关详细信息。Refer also to for more information. 你可以通过选择上面的代码值，创建你自己的自定义事件代码。You can create your own custom event code by choosing code values above . 在`eventMappings`运行状况监视的配置元素，你可以选择指定的事件代码范围。In the `eventMappings` health-monitoring configuration element, you can optionally specify an event-code range. 如果指定事件代码的范围，则映射仅适用于具有在该范围内; 一个事件代码的事件否则，它适用于所有事件代码。If the event code range is specified, the mapping only applies to the events that have an event code within that range; otherwise, it applies to all the event codes. 下面的配置文件的摘录部分演示配置为以处理其事件代码属于审核类别的事件。The following configuration file excerpt shows the configured to handle events whose event codes belong to the audit category. ``` ``` 你可以通过选择上面的代码值，创建你自己的自定义事件代码。You can create your own custom event code by choosing code values above .

summary.span: 标识 ASP.NET 状况监视应用程序事件代码的偏移量。

span.span: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET health-monitoring application event codes.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值表示的偏移量，与关联的主要事件代码类型。The value represents the offset for major event codes associated with the type. 所有应用程序代码均被赋予值大于。All application codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 表示的是指示应用程序的编译已完成的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the compilation of the application has finished.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值是主要代码，且其值大于值。The value is a major code and its value is greater than the value. ASP.NET 将引发相关编译的应用程序结束时的事件。ASP.NET raises the related event when the compilation of the application ends.

summary.span: 表示的是指示应用程序的编译已开始的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the compilation of the application has started.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值是主要代码，且其值大于值。The value is a major code and its value is greater than the value. ASP.NET 将引发相关编译的应用程序启动时的事件。ASP.NET raises the related event when the compilation of the application starts.

summary.span: 标识应用程序的详细事件代码的偏移量。

span.span: Identifies the offset for the application detail event codes.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值表示的偏移量，与关联事件的详细信息的代码范围类型。The value represents the offset for the detail event code range associated with the type. 所有应用程序详细信息代码均被赋予值大于。All application detail codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 表示的是指示信号事件发生的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that a heartbeat event occurred.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是主要代码，且其值大于。The is a major code and its value is greater than . ASP.NET 将引发相关按定期间隔，如配置文件中定义的事件。ASP.NET raises the related event at a periodic interval, as defined by the configuration file.

summary.span: 表示的是指示应用程序已关闭的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that an application has shut down.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是主要代码，且其值大于。 is a major code and its value is greater than . ASP.NET 将引发相关当应用程序关闭时的事件。ASP.NET raises the related event when the application shuts down.

summary.span: 表示的是指示应用程序的 Bin 目录中的子目录已更改或已重命名的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating a subdirectory in the application's Bin directory was changed or renamed.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指定关闭原因的详细信息代码。The is the detail code that specifies the causes of the shutdown. 当应用程序的 Bin 目录中的子目录已更改或重命名时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码和的详细信息代码。When a subdirectory in the application's Bin directory is changed or renamed, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示 Browsers 应用程序目录中的子目录已更改或已重命名的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating a subdirectory in the Browsers application directory was changed or renamed.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

summary.span: 表示的是指示生成管理器已经进行了需要关闭应用程序域的更改的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the build manager has made a change that requires the application domain to be shut down.

summary.span: 表示的是指示 ASP.NET 运行时被显式关闭的事件代码。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指定关闭原因的详细信息代码。The is the detail code that specifies the cause of the shutdown. 空闲超时超出时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码和的详细信息代码。When the idle time-out is exceeded, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示应用程序关闭原因未知的事件代码。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指定关闭原因的详细信息代码。 is the detail code that specifies the causes of the shutdown. 当应用程序关闭由于未知的原因时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码和的详细信息代码。When the application shuts down for an unknown reason, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值表示的偏移量，与关联的主要事件代码范围， ， ， ，和类型。The value represents the offset for the major event code range associated with the , , , , and types. 所有审核代码均被都赋予值大于。All audit codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 标识 ASP.NET 审核详细事件代码的偏移量。

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示与审核事件关联的详细信息的事件的代码范围的偏移量。 represents the offset for the detail-event-code range associated with audit events. 所有审核的详细信息代码均被都赋予值大于。All audit detail codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 表示的是指示在 Web 请求过程中文件授权失败的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that a file-authorization failure occurred during a Web request.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是与授权未被授予的访问权限相关的运行状况事件的主要代码。 is the major code for the health event related to the access of a file for which authorization is not granted. 当出现文件授权错误时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码。When a file-authorization failure occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示在 Web 请求过程中文件授权成功的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that a file-authorization success occurred during a Web request.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是与为其授予权限的访问权限相关的运行状况事件的主要代码。 is the major code for the health event related to the access of a file for which authorization is granted. 文件授权成功后，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码。When a file authorization is successful, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示在 Web 请求过程中窗体身份验证失败的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating a form authentication failure occurred during a Web request.

span.span: This field is constant.

summary.span: 表示的是指示在 Web 请求过程中窗体身份验证成功的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating a form-authentication success occurred during a Web request.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是与用户的身份验证成功相关的运行状况事件的主要代码。The is the major code for the health event related to a user's authentication success. 发生此事件时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码。When this event occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示视图状态验证失败的事件代码。

summary.span: 表示的是指示在 Web 请求过程中成员资格身份验证成功的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that a membership-authentication success occurred during a Web request.

summary.span: 表示的是指示在 Web 请求过程中发生了未处理的访问异常的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that an unhandled access exception occurred during a Web request.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是与授权未被授予资源访问相关的未经处理的运行状况事件的主要代码。 is the major code for the unhandled health event related to the access of a resource for which authorization is not granted. 发生此事件时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码。When this event occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示在 Web 请求过程中发生了未处理的安全性异常的事件代码。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是与安全冲突相关的未经处理的运行状况事件的主要代码。 is the major code of the unhandled health event related to a security violation. 当引发未处理的安全异常时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码。When an unhandled security exception is thrown, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示在 Web 请求过程中 URL 授权失败的事件代码。

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是与 URL 授权未被授予的使用相关的运行状况事件的主要代码。 is the major code for the health event related to the use of a URL for which authorization is not granted. URL 授权失败时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码。When the URL-authorization failure occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示在 Web 请求过程中 URL 授权成功的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating a URL-authorization success occurred during a Web request.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是与为其授予权限的 URL 的使用相关的运行状况事件的主要代码。 is the major code for the health event related to the use of a URL for which authorization is granted. 当已成功授权 URL 时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码。When a URL is successfully authorized, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 标识 ASP.NET 状况监视错误事件代码的偏移量。

span.span: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET health-monitoring error event codes.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值表示的偏移量，与关联的主要事件代码范围和类型。The value represents the offset for the major event code range associated with the and types. 所有错误代码都分配值大于。All error codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 表示的是指示提供的票证已过期的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the supplied ticket is expired.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指定用户的身份验证失败的原因的详细信息代码。 is the detail code that specifies the cause of the user's authentication failure. 当用户的身份验证由于过期票证而导致失败时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码和的详细信息代码。When the user's authentication fails due to an expired ticket, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示使用了不允许的事件代码值的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the event code value is not allowed.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示使用了系统不允许的代码值。The represents the use of a code value that is not allowed by the system. 例如，这可能发生如果你自定义 ASP.NET 运行状况监视事件并使用系统已分配的代码值。For instance, this can happen if you customize an ASP.NET health-monitoring event and use a code value that is already assigned by the system.

summary.span: 表示的是指示提供的票证无效的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the supplied ticket is invalid.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指定用户的身份验证失败的原因的详细信息代码。 is the detail code that specifies the cause of the user's authentication failure. 当用户的身份验证由于无效的票证而导致失败时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码和的详细信息代码。When the user's authentication fails due to an invalid ticket, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示提供的视图状态无效的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the supplied view state is invalid.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指定视图状态失败的原因的详细信息代码。 is the detail code that specifies the cause of the view-state failure. 视图状态错误时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码和的详细信息代码。When the view-state error occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示提供的视图状态未通过完整性检查的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the supplied view state failed the integrity check.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指定视图状态失败的原因的详细信息代码。 is the detail code that specifies the cause of the view-state failure. 在提供的视图状态失败时的完整性检查，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码和的详细信息代码。When the supplied view state fails the integrity check, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

summary.span: 标识 ASP.NET 状况监视 Web 杂项事件代码的偏移量。

span.span: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET health-monitoring Web miscellaneous event codes.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值表示与未分类的运行状况事件关联的主要事件代码范围的偏移量。The value represents the offset for the major event code range associated with health events that have not been categorized. 所有其他代码均被赋予值大于。All miscellaneous codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 标识 ASP.NET 状况监视 Web 请求事件代码的偏移量。

span.span: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET health-monitoring Web-request event codes.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值表示的偏移量，与关联的主要事件代码范围类型。The value represents the offset for the major event code range associated with the type. 所有请求代码均被都赋予值大于。All request codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 表示的是指示 Web 请求被中止的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the Web request was aborted.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指 Web 请求的异常终止的主要代码。 is the major code that refers to a Web-request abnormal termination. 当 Web 请求中止时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码。When a Web request aborts, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示 Web 请求已完成的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the Web request was completed.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指 Web 请求正常终止的主要代码。 is the major code that refers to a Web request normal termination. Web 请求完成时通常情况下，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码。When the Web request completes normally, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示发送的信息大小超过了允许的限制的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the size of the posted information exceeded the allowed limits.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为主要代码，指的是发送数据的大小超出了允许的限制。 is the major code that refers to a data posting whose size exceeds the allowed limits. 当窗体发送的数据大小超过允许的限制时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码。When a form posts data that exceeds the allowed limits, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示 Web 请求已中止的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the Web request has been aborted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指 Web 请求的异常终止的主要代码。 is the major code that refers to the abnormal termination of the Web request. 当 Web 请求中止时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码。When the Web request aborts, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示发生了未经处理的异常的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating an unhandled exception occurred.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指不由 ASP.NET 处理的匹配项的主要代码。 is the major code that refers to the occurrence of an exception that is not handled by ASP.NET. 当出现异常时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码。When the exception occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示发生了验证错误的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that a validation error occurred.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指验证异常未由 ASP.NET 的匹配项的主要代码。 is the major code that refers to the occurrence of a validation exception that is not handled by ASP.NET. 当发生此异常时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码。When this exception occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示视图状态失败的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that a view-state failure occurred.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指视图状态失败的主要代码。 is the major code that refers to a view-state failure. 在此情况下，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码。When this happens, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代码，该代码表示在访问 Web 资源期间发生了错误。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that there was an error accessing a web resource.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

summary.span: 表示的是指示 SQL 提供程序丢弃了事件的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the SQL provider dropped events.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时通知发生之后事件已丢弃在此期间，会在 SQL server 中写入特殊的警告行。When the notification occurs after the one during which events have been dropped, a special warning row is written to the SQL server. 此行通知中的所有其他事件之前编写，并且不计算中的事件总数就而言配置刷新的大小。This row is written before all other events in the notification, and is not counted in the total number of events as far as the configured flush size is concerned.

summary.span: 表示的是指示在与状态服务器通信时发生错误的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that an error occurred while communicating with the state server.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与状态服务器通信时出现连接错误时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码和详细信息的代码。When a connection error occurs while communicating with the state server, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and detail code of . 是详细信息代码，且其值大于。The is a detail code and its value is greater than the .

summary.span: 表示的是指示未定义主要事件代码值的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the major event code value is not defined.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示使用不由系统定义的主要代码值。 represents the use of a major code value that is not defined by the system.

summary.span: 表示的是指示未定义详细事件代码值的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the detail event code value is not defined.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示一个不由系统定义的详细信息的代码值的用法。 represents the use of a detail code value that is not defined by the system.

summary.span: 指示发生了编译错误。

span.span: Indicates that a compilation error occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指在应用程序编译阶段期间发生的错误的主要代码。 is the major code that refers to an error that happened during the application compilation phase. 当发生此错误时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码。When this error occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 指示发生了配置错误。

span.span: Indicates that a configuration error occurred.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指在应用程序配置阶段中发生的错误的主要代码。 is the major code that refers to an error that happened during the application-configuring phase. 当发生此错误时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码。When this error occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代码，该代码指示在反序列化对象的类型或值期间发生了错误。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that there was an error during the deserialization of the type or value of an object.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

summary.span: 表示的是指示发生了未分类错误的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that an unclassified error occurred.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是未分类错误的主要代码。 is the major code for an unclassified error. 当发生此错误时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码。When this error occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示发生了分析器错误的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating a parser error occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指在应用程序分析阶段中发生的错误的主要代码。 is the major code that refers to an error that happened during the application-parsing phase. 当发生此错误时，ASP.NET 将引发，主要代码。When this error occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代码，该代码指示在反序列化属性期间发生了错误。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that there was an error during the deserialization of a property.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

summary.span: 标识 ASP.NET 状况监视 Web 详细事件代码的偏移量。

span.span: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET health-monitoring Web-detail event codes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值表示的偏移量，与关联的详细信息事件的代码范围类型。The value represents the offset for the detail-event code range associated with the type. 所有应用程序详细信息代码均被赋予值大于。All application detail codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 表示的是提供程序用于记录有关事件的非标准信息的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code used by providers to record nonstandard information about an event.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要的代码使用的提供程序来存储非标准的运行状况事件信息。 is the major code used by providers to store nonstandard health event information. 其值大于。Its value is greater than . 例如，如果在缓冲，过程将删除 ASP.NET 运行状况事件将警告添加到消息的顶部，而无需使用。但的唯一方式将数据写入此警告是在数据库中创建一条记录。For example, if ASP.NET health events are dropped during buffering, the adds a warning to the top of the messages without using the .But the only way for the to write this warning is to create a record in the database. 在数据库中的每个记录需要一个事件 ID，因为提供程序使用作为其主要代码和作为详细信息代码来创建此 id。Because every record in the database needs an event ID, the provider uses the as its major code and as the detail code to create this ID. > [!NOTE] > 正如您可以看到从上面的讨论，不与任何 ASP.NET 运行状况事件相关联。As you can see from the above discussion, the is not associated with any ASP.NET health event.

summary.span: 标识自定义事件代码的偏移量。

span.span: Identifies the offset for the custom event codes.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您创建你自己的自定义事件，则必须使用事件代码值大于。If you create your own custom event, you must use an event code with a value greater than .
